text:
Mr* James Miles
November 18, 1952
Page 3
Until that dues structure is approved, on the other hand, you
cannot notify new members* I would suggest that you talk this
over with Frank and hold off any sizeable mailing until after
our meeting in Chicago* We will have a quorum of the Board at
the Chicago meeting and can adopt a dues schedule at that time*
I shall keep in close touch with you as we move along.
My very best regards always.
Sincerely yours.
